md:
giải nghĩa từ "least" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Least (determiner) - ít nhất
	+ Meaning: used to show that something is the smallest or lowest in amount, degree, or intensity.
	+ Example: "I have the least experience in this field."
	+ Related words: most, fewest, minimal

* Least (adverb) - ít nhất
	+ Meaning: used to show that something is done or happens to the smallest extent.
	+ Example: "He is least likely to succeed in this project."
	+ Related words: most, minimally, barely

* Least (preposition) - ít nhất
	+ Meaning: used to show that something is the smallest or lowest in importance or degree.
	+ Example: "I am least concerned about the cost."
	+ Related words: most, minimally, slightly

Note: The word "least" can be used in different ways depending on the context, but its core meaning is always related to the idea of something being the smallest or lowest in some way.

    • Meaning: used to show that something is done or happens to the smallest extent.
    • Example: "He is least likely to succeed in this project."
    • Related words: most, minimally, barely

  • Least (preposition) - ít nhất

    • Meaning: used to show that something is the smallest or lowest in importance or degree.

Note: The word "least" can be used in different ways depending on the context, but its core meaning is always related to the idea of something being the smallest or lowest in some way.
